body_html: Actually maybe this should be open because setuptools-21.0 is the default for new users and this issue was tricky to diagnose, maybe the installing for MacOS page could be updated to say that setuptools-21.0 is not supported? https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/get_started/os_setup.html#installation-for-mac-os-x
